activities: RAMP provides processing, transcoding, hosting,  storage, and delivery services  for client generated videos and audio files in order to enhance searchablility. Video and audio files processed and stored by RAMP are created by clients and may contain voices, images, and/or likenesses of individuals.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
